channel.title: Twitter
channel.description:
I've been using this for 4 months now, and I gotta say, it's developed way beyond what I imagined it could possibly do.
[url=http://twitter.com]Twitter[/url]
At its simplest, Twitter lets you know what your friends are doing, and your friends what you are doing.
At its deeper levels, Twitter is a chatroom, an alarm clock, an rss feeder, and more. One of the most useful features is the AIM chatbot, twitterim. Simply sync your screenname with your twitter id, and you can send updates via AIM to your twitter, thus unlocking much of Twitter's featureset.
If you type in 'd timer 45 call mom' and in 45 minutes, it will remind you to call your mom via AIM or text message, whichever you prefer.
So yea.
